item.title: Flashing NSPanel with Tasmota and NSPanel Lovelace UI
item.description: We’re flashing Tasmota on a Sonoff NSPanel and installing NSPanel Lovelace UI to easily create our views

item.title: Shopping List
item.description: Here I’m planning to post a list of interesting items in different categories. This list may include affiliate links. These links provide me a kickback without any extra cost at your end. Notice a broken link? Let me know! Want to support my work in a different way? Feel free to buy me a coffee! WiFi ¶WiFi Relays ¶ Shelly (EU/US) 1, 1PM, 1L, 2.5, RGBW2, Dimmer2, Uni, Plug, Plug S WiFi Sensors ¶ Shelly (EU/US) i3, EM, 3EM, Uni, Humidity & Temperature, Door/Window 2, Flood, Smoke, Gas WiFi Remotes ¶ Shelly Button1 (EU/US) WiFi Lights ¶ Shelly (EU/US) Bulb, Vintage, Duo Zigbee ¶Zigbee Controllers and Hubs ¶ Dresden Elektronik ConBee II (Amazon US/DE) Sonoff Zigbee 3.
